name: Publicly Accessible RDS Instances
query: query { dbInstances (where: { cloudProvider: "aws" publicAccessBlocked: false securityGroups_SOME: { rules_SOME: { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" } }}) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
